text.more:
This is the full network of Marcel Proust's In Search of Lost Time, first translated into English as Remembrance of Things Past, and sometimes referred to in French as La Recherche (The Search), is a novel in seven volumes by French author Marcel Proust. This early 20th century work is his most prominent work, known both for its length and its theme of involuntary memory. 

This project hopes to visualise links between words in what is both an extremely long and extremely well-regarded novel.
text.title: Remembrance of Things Past by Marcel Proust
